import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get an account by ULID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/account/ulid/{ulid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



FindByULID handles HTTP requests to retrieve an account by its ULID.
It extracts the "ulid" parameter from the request path, calls the accountService to find the account,
and returns the account data as JSON with HTTP 200 OK if found.
If the account is not found or an error occurs, it responds with HTTP 404 Not Found and an error message.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Account ULID","in":"path","name":"ulid","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
